prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: full-body portrait of a young man standing center on pure white background, impressionist oil painting style with rich light and shadow variations, visible brushstrokes, a man with ordinary yet gentle appearance, soft facial features, warm brown eyes reflecting thoughtful sensitivity, light olive skin tone, subtle melancholic yet hopeful expression, medium-length tousled chestnut brown hair with soft waves, wearing simple modern clothing: a cream-colored linen button-up shirt with rolled sleeves, beige cotton trousers, soft fabric conveying comfort, faint golden light aura surrounding his hands symbolizing empathic perception ability, delicate memory fragments like butterflies faintly visible in the air around him, overall aesthetic aligns with the beautiful and delicate tone of "Flowers for Algernon", capturing the inner conflict between fear of the unknown and desire for change, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
